basics.label: Senior Full-stack Engineer
basics.name: Elliot Schep
basics.summary: Senior Full-stack Engineer with six years of experience in full-stack development. Australian born, I am an independent, self-directed learner. Having mostly worked at StartUps, I am well versed in working many different roles. I lived in Europe for ten years

references.name: Santosh Prasad Sah
references.reference: It was really great working with Elliot in Rebel Software Ltd. He used his design skills to modify and create new pages for Voom CRM. He is a team player and always strives to improve design. I wish him best of luck

references.name: Adam Lach
references.reference: Elliot is a highly motivated UI developer, always focused on improvements and possibilities. He introduced many new ideas to UI solutions on both levels: business (UX) and technical (frameworks). Elliot is a relatively young developer but I think that with his level of motivation and potential he can be a very mature developer in a short time.

highlights: Led the management and operation of sound, video, and lighting systems for high-profile, large-scale events with thousands of attendees
Collaborated with a diverse 20-person team to deliver seamless technical production for weekly and monthly events
Played a key role in the technical execution of stage productions, ensuring high-quality audio-visual experiences
Designed and developed multiple applications to support event management, improving workflow and operational efficiency
Contributed to system architecture and integration for various stage setups, enhancing technical reliability and scalability
volunteer.summary: Volunteered as a sound and lighting technician for large-scale events, overseeing the design, setup, and operation of stage audio, video, and lighting systems. Worked closely with a 20-person technical team to manage and execute events with thousands of attendees each month. Additionally, contributed to the development of technical applications and solutions to streamline event operations.

highlights: Transitioned from a legacy monolithic, on-premises application to a containerised and serverless architecture, resulting in improved scalability and maintainability
Spearheaded the migration of the codebase to GitHub, introducing modern version control practices, streamlined CI/CD pipelines, and improved collaboration
Replaced raw HTML/JS/CSS with a modern UI framework, enhancing the user interface for better usability and responsiveness
Revamped backend services with a focus on performance, reliability, and scalability (details restricted by NDA)
Redesigned the database architecture, implementing optimisations to improve data integrity, query performance, and scalability (details restricted by NDA)
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to align technical solutions with business requirements and ensure compliance with industry standards
work.summary: Worked on modernisation of an in-house ERP system, transitioning it to a contemporary tech stack. Detailed project specifics are bound by NDA and cannot be disclosed

highlights: Led a team of 5 developers and 4 QA testers as team lead and senior full-stack engineer
Mentored 4 junior developers, fostering career growth
Actively involved in interviewing, selecting, and hiring developers
Specialised in enhancing graphic editor technology and managing a complex codebase
Implemented strategies like automated testing, modularisation, decoupling, and software design patterns to improve reliability and quality
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality features
Creator of and key contributor to forums and discussions to refine processes, tools, and development practices
work.summary: Led the main product team as a senior full-stack engineer, specialising in advancing graphic editor technology while mentoring junior developers, improving processes, and enhancing application quality and reliability

highlights: 2020: Lead Frontend Developer for the Inter-Provider Service Automation Platform, nBrace
2019–2020: Worked with Itential on two projects for their network automation solution, 'IAP'
Developed a solution for managing network infrastructure using NSO and IAP to automate and upgrade multiple network devices
Created a load balance manager with custom NSO actions for searching, creating, updating, and deleting services
Contributed to both frontend and backend development, with a focus on network orchestration
work.summary: Led frontend development for the nBrace platform and contributed to Itential’s network automation projects, focusing on enhancing infrastructure transparency and automation

highlights: Improved user satisfaction by enhancing CRM usability
Designed and developed websites, apps, and tools for Rebel's CRM/management software, 'Voom', and third-party clients
Worked on Software as a Service (SaaS) applications
Developed and maintained a hosted application on AWS infrastructure
Collaborated on a system powered by a cluster of services, utilising Go for backend development
work.summary: Led the frontend development at Rebel Software, revitalising a 3+ year old custom CRM into a production-ready system for multiple clients

highlights: Open-source contributions to ERPNext, including plugin development
Designed and developed websites with various CMS platforms:
diversityhub.pl: Built with OctoberCMS in collaboration with another developer
KLG Properties: Worked with two developers on theme customisation
Automated parsing of real estate data into a database and file system using Python
work.summary: Contributed to open-source ERP and developed websites using multiple CMS platforms, along with a Python-based data importer/exporter for real estate automation

highlights: Created website apps and admin tools for inventory and site management
Developed a CMS specifically for the jewellery industry, featuring an intuitive website creator
Designed and implemented a drag-and-drop page creator for easy customisation
Built tools for updating specific parts of the CMS using React
Worked primarily with React and Django for development
work.summary: Designed and developed apps and admin tools, including a CMS tailored for the jewellery industry, with a focus on inventory and site management
